content.name: JP_SpiralExplorer
content.description: Uncovers the fog within a specific sector as well as sectors throughout the entire galaxy.
content.author: JanPanthera

text.name: JP_SpiralExplorer
text.description: Разгоняет туман в конкретном секторе, а также в секторах по всей галактике.
text.author: JanPanthera

text.name: JP_SpiralExplorer
text.description: Dissipe le brouillard dans un secteur spécifique ainsi que dans les secteurs de toute la galaxie.
text.author: JanPanthera

text.name: JP_SpiralExplorer
text.description: Despeja la niebla dentro de un sector específico así como en sectores en toda la galaxia.
text.author: JanPanthera

text.name: JP_SpiralExplorer
text.description: Dissipa la nebbia all'interno di un settore specifico e nei settori di tutta la galassia.
text.author: JanPanthera

text.name: JP_SpiralExplorer
text.description: Rozptýlí mlhu v konkrétním sektoru i v sektorech po celé galaxii.
text.author: JanPanthera

text.name: JP_SpiralExplorer
text.description: Uncovers the fog within a specific sector as well as sectors throughout the entire galaxy.
text.author: JanPanthera

text.name: JP_SpiralExplorer
text.description: Rozprasza mgłę w konkretnym sektorze, a także w sektorach na całej galaktyce.
text.author: JanPanthera

text.name: JP_SpiralExplorer
text.description: Lüftet den Nebel in einem spezifischen Sektor sowie in Sektoren in der gesamten Galaxie.
text.author: JanPanthera

text.name: JP_SpiralExplorer
text.description: Desvenda a névoa dentro de um setor específico e em setores em toda a galáxia.
text.author: JanPanthera

text.name: JP_SpiralExplorer
text.description: 特定のセクターだけでなく、全銀河のセクター内の霧を晴らします。
text.author: JanPanthera

text.name: JP_SpiralExplorer
text.description: 특정 섹터 뿐만 아니라 전체 은하계의 섹터 내의 안개를 제거합니다.
text.author: JanPanthera

text.name: JP_SpiralExplorer
text.description: 揭示特定区域以及整个银河系中的区域内的雾气。
text.author: JanPanthera

text.name: JP_SpiralExplorer
text.description: 揭示特定區域以及整個銀河系中的區域內的霧氣。
text.author: JanPanthera
